I loved October Sky. The thing I loved most had to be the music. It worked two ways: in the first hour of the film, it gives off a sense of the competition between the kids, and the family tradition and background they shared; then in the second hour, it gives off a sense of separation between the characters.
What other movies have you used soundtrack scores to give off meaning?
